description: Barkas joins Utrecht after Celtic exit
title: Barkas joins Utrecht after Celtic exit
title_page:
Barkas joins Utrecht after Celtic exit
 - BBC Sport
maintext:
Greek goalkeeper Vasilis Barkas has joined FC Utrecht after his Celtic career was cut short this summer.
Barkas moved to the Parkhead side for Â£3m from AEK Athens on a four-year deal in summer 2020 but failed to impress.
The 29-year-old, who made the last of his 24 Celtic appearances in December 2021, spent last season on loan at Utrecht and now returns to the Eredivisie side on a one-year deal.
